tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Our experience with Dr Chandrika Kulkarni has been very pleasant. She put my mother at ease right from the start and suggested a way of investigation that none of the other doctors did so far. She's friendly *** * **** ************** We would highly recommend her.

tags: Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Need to wait around 40 min for doctor to arrive. I feel doctor was not aware of the appointment via Practo which was told by the receptionist that day. On Practo, the consultation was shown as Rs 400 but as I opted for Cash, I was charged are 500. Donâ€™t know why such discrepancy in the charges. Consultation wise doctor was not of big help as she referred us to a dermatologist for the hormone related hair fall which has started post delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First I would like to thank doctor chandrika. My first pregnancy ended with miscarriage and after 3 years, now I am pregnant. She is very friendly and polite and never hesitate to answer my queries. She identified the exact issue for my non conception and given proper iui treatment. *** ** *** **** ********* *********** Highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I came to see the doctor for infertility treatment, she does the ivf treatment within first time of treatment we got successfully ivf pregnancy with the doctor help. The doctor is very friendly she treated pregnancy problems very well, I recommend every one to kindly visit this doctor for Fertility and pregnancy treatment.
Thanks
Laxmi sanjeev

*** ********* ** ********* ****** *** i would like to suggest for childless couples to approach for **** treatment and suggestions. Doctor is very friendly and answers all the queries. I'm very thankful to Dr. Chandrika for providing the **** treatment. And now i'm mother of two beautiful twin babies. I had ever seen like Dr.Chandrika , who understands problems (not only health wise but financially) and provides **** treatment.

I have consulting the doctor chandrika in cloudnine jaynagar then while she was coming in Srujana hospital we came here in neeladri for checkup and then. I have got the treatment from one year. I have got conceived in 2 months. *** ****** ******* ** **** *** I recommend this doctor for further consultation.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** ** *********** * ****** **** **** ****** ***** I couldn't undergo a scan as she prescribed due to lock down restrictions and went for a alternative scan (time lapsed for the first scan) suggested by other doctor in that time. When I resumed my monthly checkup with this gynaec, she commented everything is alright ******* **** ******** *** **** ******* She was not bothered to have a look on that report once even when I insisted to. Moreover I got vaccines done with the other doctor when I couldn't go to this gynaec for monthly checkup. She didn't even utter a word about vaccines. I wouldn't recommend her.
